title: @Riot: Will you be releasing Kindred's ingame champion portrait as a summoner icon?
body:
Kindred is the first champ to not use a square capture of their zoomed in face in their classic skin splash, since Kindred is two entities.

You've already released a lamb and a wolf mask.

Will you be releasing an icon for Kindred's ingame portrait.

If not, I would recommend you do.

replies.body:
Hey Absolute0Chaos,

At this time, we don't have plans to release additional Kindred Summoner Icons. It's something we could consider in the future, though!
It's a shame, but thank you for taking the time to respond.

"It's something we could consider in the future, though!"

That quote is put on literally every Riot post. Basically, "It's a cool idea, but no, we're never going to do it. Better luck next time!"
